about_the_game:
Lux the Reindeer and his friends are on a mission to protect Winter!

When Jack Frost infiltrates Santa's Workshop and steals the 6 Grand Presents the fate of the season hangs in the balance! Join the Red nosed Reindeer Lux and his friends in their struggle to defeat Jack Frost's forces and prevent an Eternal Winter!

In this cool Adventure RPG Fight foes in frantic turn based battles with real-time elements and action commands! Saddle up! Collect equipment and magical baubles to boost your party's stats and unlock new skills in battle!

Make use of your Reindeer abilities in the overworld to run and jump as you explore the settings. Solve puzzles using your magical red-nose to fire lasers or charge with your antlers to break straight through obstacles!

Be a Deer!

  • Exploration with Platforming!

  • Fast paced RPG turn based battles with Action Commands! Time your button presses to maximise damage!

  • Evade enemy attacks in real time and Use Z-Skills to strike foes during their turn!

  • An exciting 6-chapter adventure awaits!

  • Customise characters for battle with dozens of equipment, skills and abilities!

  • Meet a cast of 100's of cool, cute and crude characters!

  • All this and more await in Reindeer Story!

Reindeer Story draws inspiration from a varied set of classic and modern RPGs including Paper Mario, Mario & Luigi, Final Fantasy 1-9 and Deltarune. It will feature a 10+ hour main story line, New Game+ and a lot of optional content and secrets to uncover that will give you reasons to keep coming back!

They say the story of the red nose reindeer captured the hearts of millions... This game is a fun and surprising adventure that will be great to play every Winter as a tradition!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Celeron 1.60GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Play Tested on a HP Stream Laptop 11-y0xx . Would very likely run fine on lower specs
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 7 2700U,2.20 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 900 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Tested on Lenovo Yoga 530-14ARR Latop

reviews:
“Reindeer Story is a nice game that can be surprisingly naughty in terms of difficulty and writing.”
8/10 – GameGrin

“The game’s biggest draw is its charming story, which starts from some familiar but copyright-safe origins and then begins to spread into the sillier mythos of Christmas. Fans of the equally cornball Zeboyd games (Cthulhu Saves the World, etc.) are probably the best base from which to support developer Azzie in whatever project they’re ready to tackle next. And I do hope they keep going.”
I Like It – Ladies Gamers
short_description: Slip into the hooves of a Reindeer! Run, jump and explore through 6 Chapters of Adventure! Face foes in turn based RPG battles, evade attacks in real-time and retaliate with Z-Skills!
